attributes.action: REVERSE CLOSURE OF SPECIAL SCHOOLS AND PROVIDE SPECIALIST UNIVERSITIES OR COLLEGES FOR THOSE WITH LEARNING, MENTAL AND EMOTIONAL DISABILITIES
attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls on the Secretary of State for Education Mr Michael Gove to reverse the closure of specialist schools for pupils who suffer from learning, mental or emotional disabilities.

Further more to begin the establishment of specialist Universities or colleges for young people wanting to pursue further academic learning who suffer from the above mentioned disabilities.
